name: EPS Series Vol. 1: Because I Love You: Yukiko Morikawa
overview: Playstation's first music software appeared! The content is a new generation music visual software which recorded 2 original songs + 1 remix of the new artist, 1 photo of still songs, still picture photo collection (about 200 to 300 points), promotion VTR (editing function + director's cut). Real-life capture technology of PlayStation realizes the beauty of still images and videos! The height of the quality is overwhelming. Features: First person perspective 2D graphics Prerendered graphics Music theme
